name: Seacode
tagline: Code for (and by) fisheries stock assessment modelers
body:
### Welcome to Seacode
Seacode is a Github Organization for Fisheries Stock Assessment Modelers. The repository hosts a number of open-source projects currently under development. Each project can be accessed via its respective Github Project page listed below.

### Current Projects
- [Gmacs](https://github.com/seacode/gmacs): a generic size-based stock assessment modelling framework
- [Gmr](https://github.com/seacode/gmr): an R package in support of the Gmacs project
- [Cstar](https://github.com/seacode/cstar): a stock assessment function library for [ADMB](http://www.admb-project.com)
- [Rstar](https://github.com/seacode/rstar): an R package providing complimentary code for the ADMB Cstar Library

### Recent Reports
Progress report and overview presentation for the September 2014 [BSAI Crab Plan Team](http://www.npfmc.org/fishery-management-plan-team/bsai-crab-plan-team/) meeting:
- [CPT Report 2014-09](https://seacode.github.io/reports/2014-09-progress)
- [CPT Presentation 2014-09](https://seacode.github.io/reports/2014-09-slides.pdf)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with a Seacode project? Contact @awhitten or @jimianellil and weâ€™ll help you out.
